basic_info.name: JNTUK University College of Engineering Placements
description: The Training and Placement Cell is a helping arm for the student’s career after their course. The Cell of JNTUK-UCEV recognizes the needs of the industry and builds awareness in the students for several opportunities by their caliber. Students receive continuous training in communication and business skills in a professional decorum. This helps in strengthening their expert competence. The top visiting companies in the college are mentioned below

Glancing at the academic record of the college, each year top-notch brands approach the college for placing the most suited students under their umbrella. The companies offer worthy positions to the candidates with a decent pay scale. The average package awarded is around 3-3.5 lakh each year.

Section.name: About University College of Engineering, JNTUK
Section.description:
JNTUK University College of Engineering Vizianagaram was founded in 2007, approved by the All India Council for Technical Education. Being a constituent college of Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Kakinada, the institute has a highly polished educational infrastructure with an international outlook and live synergy with the relevant industries. The college aims at rendering human resources to the industry in the disciplines of Computer Science and Information Technology, Infrastructure development, Communication, networking and more.
Read More: JNTUK University College of Engineering Admissions
The college renders four-year undergraduate courses in diverse disciplines of Engineering. The programs offered are highlighted below:
